name: Kawaii Pixel Art
description:
Do you like Kawaii things and color pixel? So this game is for you!

Blow your stress away with kawaii images and coloring a lot of pixel images!

• A LOT OF KAWAII IMAGES •
In this cute kawaii game you will find a lot of kawaii images: candies, animals, food, rainbows, sun and more! There are more than 100 images to you color pixel by pixel. Do not waste more time, download now to quickly color all the kawaii images!

• HOW TO PLAY •
- Choose one of the kawaii images from library
- Pick the colors and click in the pixels with the same number
- Finished! Now you have a kawaii cute pixel image for you share with friends!

• FEATURES •
- Blow your stress away with kawaii images
- 100+ kawaii images
- Easy to color
- Cute images
- Free to play
- Share your works with friends!

Can you color all the kawaii images? Download now for free!

• SAY HELLO •
We are constantly working hard on making the “Kawaii Pixel - Color by Number” game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “Kawaii Pixel - Color by Number” game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

“Kawaii Pixel - Color by Number” is a game developed by KEISE Entertainment, the creators of “Kawaii Album” and “Another Dinosaur Run Game”!
